# Virus Notebook 1

Just a couple of simple implementations to get our hands dirty.

## Define Parameters

```{r}
parameters <- c(
  beta = 5,
  gamma = 0.7,
  N = 60
)
```

## Deterministic Model

(using the logarithmic form recommended by Felicia)

```{r}
library(deSolve)

state <- c(
  X = log(59),
  Y = log(1)
)

Infection <- function(t, state, parameters) {
  with(as.list(c(state, parameters)),{
    dX <- -beta * exp(Y) / N
    dY <- beta * exp(X) / N - gamma
    list(c(dX, dY))
  })
}

times <- seq(0, 10, by = 0.005)
out <- ode(y=state, times=times, func = Infection, parms=parameters)
# head(out)
plot(out[, "time"], lapply(out[, "Y"], exp), xlab="time", ylab="infections")
```
